message: This proposal divides the funds equally, ensuring a fair share while considering the decreasing value of money over time.
I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor.  While I value fairness, the money is losing value quickly, and this deal ensures we both get a decent share before it's too late.
I propose an equal division of the funds, recognizing the risk of further inflation and aiming for a balanced outcome where neither party feels disadvantaged.
